title: Some technical help?
body: Okay just hoping someone could help me with this, so a few days ago randomly when i tried to play league after the champ select screen when it usually goes black then shows everyone skins n champion, instead it just stayed black and a text box came up about not being able to connect to a server because of a firewall, curious because no updates were around then and i didnt mess with my computer so its a bit random, i have sent of a ticket about it but i would much rather fix it this year, have already tried going through my firewall and changing things around to no result. help would be appreciated please and thank you {{champion:17}}

replies.body:
>i have sent of a ticket about it but i would much rather fix it this year

heh

Was this on Patch 5.1 or Patch 4.21?
its broken but riot is not admitting it sadly:(, they shifting blame on the players just like always. its their golden rule :P kidding :)
juST RECENTLY JUST BEFORE PATCH 5.1 RELEASE (DURING PATCH 4.21) AND ALSO AFTER PATCH 5.1.
